kl.description: 克隆仓库 (ke long) → git clone <url>

csh.description: 初始化仓库 (chu shi hua) → git init

tja.description: 添加文件 (tian jia) → git add <file>

tj.description: 提交更改 (ti jiao) → git commit -m <message>

ch.description: 撤回文件 (che hui) → git checkout -- <file>

ckfz.description: 查看分支 (fen zhi) → git branch

fzxq.description: 分支详情 (fen zhi xiang qing) → git branch -v

ycfz.description: 远程分支 (yuan cheng fen zhi) → git branch -r

cjfz.description: 创建分支 (chuang jian fen zhi) → git checkout -b <branch>

qhfz.description: 切换分支 (qie huan fen zhi) → git checkout <branch>

ts.description: 推送代码 (tui song) → git push

lq.description: 拉取代码 (la qu) → git pull

hq.description: 获取更新 (huo qu) → git fetch

ckyc.description: 查看远程仓库 (cha kan yuan cheng) → git remote -v

tyc.description: 添加远程仓库 (tian jia yuan cheng) → git remote add <n> <url>

scyc.description: 删除远程仓库 (shan chu yuan cheng) → git remote remove <n>

cmmyc.description: 重命名远程仓库 (chong ming ming yuan cheng) → git remote rename <old> <new>

xgyc.description: 修改远程URL (xiu gai yuan cheng) → git remote set-url <n> <url>

hb.description: 合并分支 (he bing) → git merge <branch>

zf.description: 整合分支 (zheng he) → git rebase <branch>

ht.description: 回退版本 (hui tui) → git reset

rz.description: 查看日志 (ri zhi) → git log

yhrz.description: 一行日志 (yi hang ri zhi) → git log --oneline

ztxq.description: 状态详情 (zhuang tai xiang qing) → git status -s

bq.description: 标签列表 (biao qian) → git tag

cjbq.description: 创建标签 (chuang jian biao qian) → git tag -a <tag> -m <message>

bqxq.description: 标签详情 (biao qian xiang qing) → git tag -l

kstj.description: 快速提交 (kuai su ti jiao) → git add . && git commit -m && git push

ycsh.description: 远程设置 (yuan cheng she zhi) → git remote add origin <url> && git push -u origin main
